card.name: CW - GCCW132 - Mbod no docs for verification

data.text:
@gillianoberholzer @willemhuman @neilbosworth @stefanbar 

It seems like the "Send to Admin" is causing problems here.
I don't think we gave enough attention to this feature.

If a 1st Capturer sends a case to an Admin then the 2nd Capturer cant below allowed to send to admin as well. The Verifier needs 2 sets of XML to compare. If the Admin guy does all the work then there will only be 1 XML. Then we might as well create a Admin Captuer 1 and Admin Capturer 2 which was never the case initially.

it seems that we will have to cancel the 2nd Capturer from sending to Admin.

I have changed the database a bit to do double checks on records sent to Admin as it was messing with the process.

Please ask the Verifier to grab a new record so long.
